channel.title: ttrpg on Getting Better
channel.description: Recent content in ttrpg on Getting Better

item.title: Smells Fishy, Jack! A Gonzo Post-Apocalyptic Adventure
item.description: An excuse to write zany strangeness. Welcome to the Kapitol Wastes of former Metro Manila!

item.title: Thundering Steps
item.description: Rules for playing nomadic horse archers. Inspired by Chainmail and ODnD.

item.title: Ten Haily Marys in the Dark
item.description: On institutional violence and the viciousness it perpetuates in a world beyond healing. It’s also something I made and distributed without PDFs.

item.title: Sages and a Non-Vancian Magic System
item.description: A random magic system for use in your games.
